page.title: 11Living in Stanwell
page.content:
Old Stanwell was not like it is now, because the roads used to be only tracks, but they are covered with tarmac now. I like Stanwell because there are lots of grass and trees. I like the people because they are friendly. I do not like the noise of the aeroplanes because they wake me up when I am in bed. The airport does make lots of jobs though.
Gemma Leggatt Aged 7yrs
I like Stanwell because the people are nice. I don't like the people who throw rubbish in the well, because Preetpal and I had to clean it up.
Keran Pawar Aged 7 yrs
